body.p:
Lousiville Ky April 23d 1862
Hon B Magoffin,
Your Excellecy:

There is a woman named Betsy Riley, free woman of color, now confined in the Work-House on a charge of keeping an assignation house, in penalty of 75 cts per day for $5000/00. The charge was made by a visitor to the house, and as she has served more than half the term, I, at the solicitation of her husband, respectfully petition for her release. So far as I am informed, it is certainly a malicious act upon the part of the informer. With the utmost respect your

Most Obt Servant
Geo B Baum

To
B Magoffin Esq
Gov Kentucky
Frankfort

Louisville City Ct
$50. } Mis --
Betsy Riley
Remission Issd May 17. 1862
